HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: Cara mengubah ukuran gambar
steps: Klik Pilih File untuk mengunggah gambar dari perangkat Anda atau klik tombol drop-down untuk mengunggah dari Dropbox atau Google Drive.
Sesuaikan dimensi dan format gambar sesuai dengan spesifikasi yang Anda inginkan.
Untuk melihat perubahan yang telah Anda buat, klik Pratinjau.
Simpan perubahan Anda dengan mengklik tombol Simpan Perubahan.
Untuk mendapatkan gambar yang diubah ukurannya, klik tombol Download.

FAQ.question: What's the difference between scaling and resizing? The resizer image to 24x24 dimensions tool is used to perform the scaling?
FAQ.answer: The biggest difference between scaling and resizing lies in the way that the resolution of the image is altered. While resizing involves a more exact pixel size, scaling is a less exact process. In this case, the original image must be multiples of the final size, which can result in a pixelated effect. This is a key feature to consider when resizing an image. Using the resizer image to 24x24 dimensions tool, we can only resize images in inches; it is not useful for scaling.
